verses.text: Do you indeed speak righteousness, silent ones? Do you judge blamelessly, you sons \w of|strong="H4387"\w* men?

\w No|strong="H1696"\w*, \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H8199"\w* heart \w you|strong="H1696"\w* plot injustice. \w You|strong="H1696"\w* measure \w out|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* violence \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H8199"\w* hands \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H3027"\w* \w wicked|strong="H5766"\w* go astray \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* womb. \w They|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* wayward \w as|strong="H3027"\w* soon \w as|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* born, speaking lies.

\w Their|strong="H7563"\w* poison \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w like|strong="H8582"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* poison \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* snake, \w like|strong="H8582"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* deaf cobra \w that|strong="H8582"\w* stops its ear,

\w which|strong="H1823"\w* doesn’t listen \w to|strong="H2534"\w* \w the|strong="H3644"\w* voice \w of|strong="H2534"\w* charmers, no matter how skillful \w the|strong="H3644"\w* charmer \w may|strong="H5175"\w* be.

Break \w their|strong="H8085"\w* teeth, \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* mouth. Break \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* great teeth \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* young lions, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H3068"\w* vanish \w like|strong="H3068"\w* water \w that|strong="H3068"\w* flows away. \w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* draw \w the|strong="H3068"\w* bow, let \w their|strong="H3068"\w* arrows \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* blunt.

\w Let|strong="H3988"\w* \w them|strong="H4135"\w* \w be|strong="H4135"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* snail \w which|strong="H4325"\w* melts \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w passes|strong="H1980"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w*, \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* stillborn child, \w who|strong="H1869"\w* has \w not|strong="H3988"\w* seen \w the|strong="H1980"\w* sun.

\w Before|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H2372"\w* pots \w can|strong="H1980"\w* feel \w the|strong="H1980"\w* heat \w of|strong="H8121"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* thorns, \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H8121"\w* sweep \w away|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* green \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w burning|strong="H1980"\w* \w alike|strong="H3644"\w*.

\w The|strong="H2962"\w* righteous \w shall|strong="H2416"\w* rejoice \w when|strong="H3644"\w* \w he|strong="H2962"\w* sees \w the|strong="H2962"\w* vengeance. \w He|strong="H2962"\w* \w shall|strong="H2416"\w* wash his feet \w in|strong="H5518"\w* \w the|strong="H2962"\w* blood \w of|strong="H2416"\w* \w the|strong="H2962"\w* wicked,

\w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* say, “Most \w certainly|strong="H3588"\w* there \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* reward \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*. Most \w certainly|strong="H3588"\w* there \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* God \w who|strong="H6662"\w* judges \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth.”
